item.title: 国际货币基金组织称，向电动汽车的转变将产生深远影响
item.description: 国际货币基金组织周二在更新全球经济增长预测时表示，全球向电动汽车的过渡将对投资、生产、国际贸易和就业产生 "深远 "影响。【原文：The global transition toward electric vehicles will have "far-reaching" impacts on investment, production, international trade and employment, the International Monetary Fund said on Tuesday as part of its update to global economic growth forecasts.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）上调美国经济增长预期，但下调中国经济预期；全球经济乏善可陈
item.description: 国际货币基金组织周二上调了对美国、巴西和英国2024年经济增长的预测，但下调了对中国、日本和欧元区的预测，并补充说，武装冲突、潜在的新贸易战以及紧缩货币政策带来的负面影响等风险依然存在。【原文：The International Monetary Fund on Tuesday raised its 2024 economic growth forecasts for the U.S., Brazil and Britain but cut them for China, Japan and the euro zone, adding that risks abound from armed conflicts, potential new trade wars and the hangover from tight monetary policy.】

item.title: IMF 首席经济学家称内需不足助推中国出口增长
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）首席经济学家皮埃尔-奥利维耶-古林夏（Pierre-Olivier Gourinchas）告诉路透社记者，中国的产业政策可能会在某些特定行业产生影响，但这并不是中国出口和对外盈余不断增长的根本原因。【原文：China's industrial policy may be tipping the scales in some specific industries, but it is not the root cause of the country's growing exports and external surpluses, IMF chief economist Pierre-Olivier Gourinchas told Reuters.】

item.title: Starboard 称 Kenvue 的皮肤健康业务部门影响业绩
item.description: Starboard Value 认为消费品公司 Kenvue 是个便宜货，并称其皮肤健康和美容部门增长乏力是股价表现不佳的原因。【原文：Starboard Value called consumer products company Kenvue a bargain and said its skin health and beauty segment's lackluster growth is the reason for the stock's underperformance.】

item.title: 国内需求强劲，VinFast 第三季度交付量猛增
item.description: 越南电动汽车制造商 VinFast 周二表示，第三季度交付了 21912 辆电动汽车，环比增长 66%。【原文：Vietnamese EV maker VinFast said on Tuesday it delivered 21,912 electric vehicles in the third quarter, up 66% from the sequentially previous quarter.】

item.title: 尼古丁袋需求强劲，菲利普莫里斯上调年度利润预期
item.description: 菲利普莫里斯国际公司（Philip Morris International）周二上调了年度利润预期，此前该公司第三季度业绩超出预期，原因是其加热烟草产品和 ZYN 尼古丁袋的价格上涨，且需求保持稳定。【原文：Philip Morris International raised its annual profit forecast after beating third-quarter estimates on Tuesday, betting on higher prices and resilient demand for its heated tobacco products and ZYN nicotine pouches.】

item.title: 由于需求疲软，工业油漆制造商 Sherwin-Williams 盈利不及预期
item.description: 工业油漆生产商 Sherwin-Williams 周二公布的第三季度利润低于华尔街预期，主要原因是该公司面向住房、汽车和航空航天领域的销售额下降。【原文：Industrial paintmaker Sherwin-Williams missed Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Tuesday, hurt by lower sales in its segments that cater to the housing, automotive and aerospace sectors.】

item.title: 阿根廷陷入困境的经济将在 2025 年反弹：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，在经历了两年的经济衰退之后，阿根廷陷入困境的经济将在 2025 年出现反弹，因为政府正试图通过缩减国家规模的 "链锯 "计划来激发私营部门推动的经济复苏。【原文：Argentina's beleaguered economy is set to rebound in 2025 after two years of recession as the government tries to spark a private sector-driven recovery with its "chainsaw" plan to shrink the size of the state, a Reuters poll showed.】

item.title: 独家报道凯雷退出蒂森克虏伯海事部门竞购过程
item.description: 德国凯雷公司（Carlyle）周二表示，已退出正在进行的对破产企业集团蒂森克虏伯（Thyssenkrupp）军舰部门的竞购。【原文：Carlyle has dropped out of an ongoing bidding process for the warship division of stricken conglomerate Thyssenkrupp , the German company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 产品需求强劲，穆迪将全年利润预期上调至高于预期水平
item.description: 周二，评级机构穆迪（Moody's）上调了全年调整后利润预期，高于华尔街预期，并公布第三季度盈利增长近 31%，原因是市场对其研究和分析产品的需求强劲。【原文：Ratings agency Moody's raised its full-year adjusted profit forecast above Wall Street estimates and posted a nearly 31% rise in third-quarter earnings on Tuesday, on strong demand for its research and analytics products.】

item.title: 自由港麦克莫兰公司第三季度利润超出预期
item.description: 受铜价上涨的影响，矿业公司 Freeport-McMoRan 周二公布的第三季度利润超出预期。【原文：Miner Freeport-McMoRan beat third-quarter profit estimates on Tuesday, helped by higher copper prices.】

item.title: 现代公司的 Supernal 与两家公司合作开发电池动力飞机
item.description: 现代汽车公司旗下的 Supernal 周二表示，该公司已与一家私人飞机包机公司和一家客运直升机运营商合作开发空中出租车基础设施。【原文：Hyundai Motor's Supernal said on Tuesday it had partnered with a private jet charter firm and a passenger helicopter operator for the development of its air taxi infrastructure.】

item.title: 武器需求强劲，洛克希德-马丁公司上调利润和销售预期
item.description: 受全球紧张局势升级对军事装备强劲需求的推动，国防承包商洛克希德-马丁公司周二与竞争对手 RTX 公司一道上调了年度利润和销售预期。【原文：Defense contractor Lockheed Martin on Tuesday joined rival RTX in lifting annual profit and sales forecasts, driven by strong demand for military equipment amid escalating global tensions.】

item.title: PulteGroup 盈利超预期，因抵押贷款利率下降提振住房需求
item.description: 美国住宅建筑商普尔特集团（PulteGroup）周二公布的第三季度财报超出华尔街预期，原因是固定抵押贷款利率下降吸引了市场上谨慎的买家，而历史上较低的住房供应量使需求保持强劲。【原文：U.S. homebuilder PulteGroup beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter earnings on Tuesday, as declining fixed mortgage rates lured in skittish buyers to the market, while historically low housing supply kept demand strong.】

item.title: 塔吉特将在节假日前降低 2000 种商品的价格
item.description: 塔吉特（Target）零售商周二表示，该公司正在对从零食到玩具和感冒药的 2000 多种商品进行降价促销，以吸引在节日期间淘便宜货的顾客。【原文：Target is reducing prices on more than 2,000 items ranging from snacks to toys and cold medicine in an effort to attract bargain-hunting shoppers during the holiday season, the retailer said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 券商上调 2024 年中国 GDP 增长预期
item.description: 官方数据显示，中国经济在 7-9 月份增长了 4.6%，这是自 2023 年初以来的最慢增速，也低于第二季度 4.7% 的增速，因为房地产行业的下滑仍然是中国政府面临的主要挑战。【原文：China's economy grew 4.6% in July-September, official data showed, its slowest pace since early 2023 and below the 4.7% pace in the second quarter, as a tumbling property sector remained a major challenge for Beijing.】

item.title: Verizon 灵活的 5G 计划使无线用户新增数量超过预期
item.description: 由于美国电信巨头的促销活动以及将 5G 与 Netflix 等流媒体服务捆绑在一起的计划有助于吸引客户，Verizon 第三季度新增无线用户数量超过预期。【原文：Verizon added more wireless subscribers than expected in the third quarter as the U.S. telecom giant's promotional offers and plans that bundle 5G with streaming services like Netflix helped attract customers.】

item.title: RTX 因飞机维修和国防系统需求再次上调 2024 年预测值
item.description: RTX 公司周二第二次上调了 2024 年调整后的利润和销售预期，理由是飞机维修和国防系统需求强劲。【原文：RTX on Tuesday raised its 2024 adjusted profit and sales forecasts for the second time, citing strong demand for aircraft repairs and defense systems.】

item.title: 消费者转向廉价选择，金佰利公司下调销售预期
item.description: 面巾纸生产商金佰利-克拉克公司周二下调了全年有机净销售额预期，此前该公司第三季度销售额低于华尔街预期，原因是注重成本的消费者将价格较高的个人护理用品换成了价格较低的替代品。【原文：Kleenex tissue maker Kimberly-Clark on Tuesday cut its full-year organic net sales forecast after missing Wall Street estimates for third-quarter sales, as cost-conscious consumers swap its pricier personal care goods for cheaper alternatives.】

item.title: 需求复苏，3M 上调全年调整后利润预期下限
item.description: 美国工业集团 3M 公司周二上调了全年调整后利润预期的下限，预计美联储 9 月份下调借贷成本后将刺激消费支出。【原文：U.S. industrial conglomerate 3M Co raised the lower end of its full-year adjusted profit forecast on Tuesday, anticipating a boost in consumer spending after the Federal Reserve cut borrowing costs in September.】

item.title: 通用汽车业绩超出华尔街目标；公司对全年盈利充满信心
item.description: 通用汽车公司今年继续打破华尔街的预期，由于汽油发动机卡车和 SUV 的销售稳定，以及注重保持库存的精简，其第三季度业绩超过了分析师的预期。【原文：General Motors continued to defy Wall Street's expectations this year, posting third-quarter results ahead of analyst projections on the back of steady gasoline-engine truck and SUV sales and a focus on keeping inventories lean.】

item.title: 售后服务需求强劲，通用电气航空航天集团上调 2024 年利润预期
item.description: 本周二，通用电气航空航天集团今年第三次上调了全年利润预期，原因是航空公司对售后服务的需求强劲，而航空公司正依靠旧飞机来弥补新飞机的不足。【原文：GE Aerospace raised its full-year profit forecast for the third time this year on Tuesday, driven by strong demand for aftermarket services from airlines that are relying on older planes to make up for the shortage of newer aircraft.】

item.title: 早间投标国际货币基金组织（IMF）预测到期，债券大跌
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 三哩岛核电站为大科技重启做好准备
item.description: 宾夕法尼亚州 Constellation 能源公司三里岛核电站的巨型冷却塔长期处于休眠状态，以至于塔内空心的基座上长满了草，还有野生动物在里面游荡。【原文：Giant cooling towers at Constellation Energy's Three Mile Island nuclear plant in Pennsylvania have sat dormant for so long that grass has sprung up in the towers' hollowed-out bases and wildlife roam inside.】

item.title: 盈利迫在眉睫，期货承压；收益率上升
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货下跌，因为债券抛售推动国债收益率走高，对利率敏感的股票承压，而投资者则在等待大量的企业财报，以获得更明确的市场方向。【原文：U.S. stock index futures fell on Tuesday, as a selloff in bonds pushed Treasury yields higher, pressuring rate-sensitive stocks, while investors awaited a deluge of corporate earnings for a clearer market direction.】

item.title: 本田因高压燃油泵问题召回逾72.08万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周二表示，由于高压燃油泵可能破裂并泄漏燃油，本田公司将在美国召回超过72.08万辆汽车。【原文：Honda is recalling over 720,800 vehicles in the U.S. as a high pressure fuel pump may crack and leak fuel, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国 "光棍节 "销售节未能激发消费者热情
item.description: 中国最大的购物盛会正在进行中，但大多数商家和零售业分析师预计销售额将持平或最多不温不火地增长，因为消费者仍然对中国的经济困境感到非常沮丧。【原文：China's largest shopping event is underway but most merchants and retail analysts expect flat or at best, tepid sales growth, noting consumers are still very much dispirited by the country's economic woes.】

item.title: 美国监管机构公布消费者数据 "开放银行 "规则
item.description: 美国消费者金融保护最高监督机构周二公布了期待已久的规则，旨在推动向开放银行业务转变并刺激竞争，允许消费者在购买服务时控制和共享自己的数据。【原文：The top U.S. watchdog agency for consumer financial protection on Tuesday unveiled long-awaited rules intended to drive a shift toward open banking and spur competition, allowing consumers to control and share their own data when shopping for services.】

item.title: 泰国财政部长称 2024 年经济增长率可能达不到 3%，但 2025 年会达到
item.description: 泰国财政部长周二表示，泰国今年的经济增长率可能达不到 3%，但由于政府将加快投资，明年的经济增长率将超过 3%。【原文：Thailand's economic growth may not reach 3% this year but should come in above that level next year as the government will accelerate investment, the finance minister said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 高盛称在特朗普关税和减税政策下欧元可能下跌 10
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）表示，如果唐纳德-特朗普在 11 月 5 日的美国总统大选中获胜，他将大范围征收关税并削减国内税收，那么欧元的跌幅可能高达 10%，这意味着欧元将从目前的水平跌破 1 美元。【原文：Goldman Sachs has said the euro could fall as much as 10% - implying a drop below $1 from current levels - in a scenario in which Donald Trump imposes widespread tariffs and cuts domestic taxes if he wins the Nov. 5 U.S. presidential election.】
